posts.body: Time to start putting quality content instead of testing shitposts.

posts.subject: Screenshot Thread
posts.body: Can we get the ball rolling for actual vidya discussions? Post your most recent screenshots.

I did
[code]
git clone https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet/
sudo python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt
screen python3 zeronet.py 
[/code]
and it just works.
We should seed the board with some video game discussions. Something decent, doesn't have to be amazing. Just having sparse crap on the catalog isn't very enticing to post on.

It's Diablo II replaying season for me.
I also play War for the Overworld skirmish against AI.

>>3782b491-673e-4c73-887a-4c2ce5def157
That's fine, but maybe contain it to a thread like this? It doesn't look good to have a catalog filled with crap.

I guess we can treat this as the Post When You Visit / Meta / General Discussions Thread.

>>798b4eb2-91bd-4c6c-9ce6-89c6de811065
Looks more like paintings than a game.

posts.subject: Welcome to /misc/
posts.body:
This board is for various topics not covered by other boards. Discuss random things e.g botany, uncommon hobbies, but don't treat it like /b/.

>Why this board?
The way I saw it on 8chan, there were a lot of small boards with little activity, and several hobbies that didn't warrant its own board. Hence this may:
1. Be a hub to gather interest on niche hobbies. 
2. Expose anons to new hobbies.
3. Ideally help smaller boards (once made) outreach to general anons.

ZeroMail contact: 
[code]17wvyfuxoqmwbo8p@zeroid.bit[/code]

Millchan sister board: 
[code]http://127.0.0.1:43110/1ADQAHsqsie5PBeQhQgjcKmUu3qdPFg6aA/?:users/1F4Ed2JCo7ffcFFFREMtKFrtSonFL381bp:infinity:catalog[/code]

posts.subject: 08chan and ZeroNet General Discussion
posts.body: I get the simple instructions at the homepage. But I have to wonder, hypothetically if a user is muted, how does one unmute in case of any error?

>>acc01751-f92c-46c7-b44d-e669f3fc1c4d
I think we all have a dream game, just that bringing into reality isn't something easy to do. One person doing the programming, animations, script, etc sounds daunting.

Could we use this board as an archive for gamergate related content like screencaps and articles? The decentralized nature makes it perfect for that. Plus it gives the board on-topic starting material.

Right now it feels like anons are meeting up and getting the feel of the place.

>>e51f7033-beb0-442b-9cf6-c716823d678a
In my opinion, if you want to tell a story, you could writefag short stories or a novel. That way you can do worldbuilding, characterizations, etc. Then you can adapt it later to a video game. For example The Witcher and Metro were based on books. It's probably the most independent form of art you could pursue since you don't need a team nor much consensus to start building.

If you're primarily interested in game-only aspects like mechanics, you could still write a design document.

>>efdc2962-a583-4a33-afb4-cf551702fb6c
Is the creator or whoever is in charge of this website still around to update? That'd be concerning otherwise.

>>fd8af683-8b05-44b0-83e8-bc790fab2e61
I'm just saying. 
This site has been around for a year since there's a thread from 2018. For example, I have an article written by anon shared as a .pdf in GamerGate threads that discuss feminist antagonism towards male sexuality, and some photos of my Rebuild Initiative letters. 

We could store that content among others instead of the catalog being as is now.

>>659dc8cc-bbfb-489a-8569-32347c57d244
Is there any contact with whoever is in charge? At least a bop to keep this up-to-date and maintained.

How does a board owner designate thread reply limits and board page limits? Just to keep the locally stored content under control. There isn't much content here at the moment, but if this is going to be a refuge for 8chan users, then there should be some considerations re: board growth.

>>19600bf1-3e3e-4b63-8188-3fa68aa8efb1
I gave millchan a visit and the first thing I had to do was constantly allocate more space in order to see a full index of boards. I don't really mind there being mini-clones of millchan being amok and it might actually be a good idea to have small focused instances. Hypothetically I don't want to have to download /pol/ or other large boards if all I visit is /tech/ and /v/. 
This place was shilled on several images as the backup place for over a year. So this place is going to be a first stop for many anons at least.

>>8bcce253-fda9-41c1-8744-5af6d8753ea9
That's understandable. I looked over at the merger version and don't see anything on it.
What would you say about personal concerns that 8chan users may disrupt the existing community at Millchan? For example, 4chan users are generally not welcome at 8chan. And lainchan has its distinct identity for many to not-want to start threads without getting the proper feel of the place.

>>8bcce253-fda9-41c1-8744-5af6d8753ea9
>Until that's done you can just mute/blacklist the boards you don't want.
Doesn't this also mute the user who made the board? E.g while I don't want to load content from the board /l/, there may also be posts from the owner of /l/ on other boards that I would want to see.
Faggot with the Ai no Kusabi fanfic reporting.

>>f81f3f6f-f980-44c4-941a-cde9c01cc378
I'd just make a .webm or link invidious for that matter. If you ask me, for videos I'd be totally willing to use torrents to watch.

>>9782a671-5608-42b8-bd6d-a369c2e8f98f
Also since the other anon left before I could respond, this is my faggot fanfic:
https://archiveofourown.org/series/1353658

Life in Midas is Part 2 of the story. I just chopped everything up to get an idea of reader retention between chapters. There's really not much gay shit going on, even though there are faggots. Gayest shit that goes on is shirtless man acting a little seductive, and a girl getting too close to the main character's man crush.

It's rated T for bad language and robot SWAT killing off three teenagers.

I asked over here and got an answer:
>>>/misc/3

(Does crosslinking work?)

Edit: 

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1DdPHedr5Tz55EtQWxqvsbEXPdc4uCVi9D/?:users/17wVyfuXoQmWbo8pMvzWx7iSNdA3446NdF:misc:f0efbe66-3b82-4bb7-a151-640c1c30d565

>>d3ce66cc-5edb-4952-9093-7772203e33be
>1PwMmePentyZYGS38r9ko5PBhNffAkPYc4
>almost looks like pwn me plenty
You've got a really weird stroke of luck to get that as a board id.

Alright well in case technical issues arise even with this site. 

I made this board on Millchan since I'm on that kind of spree.
[code]
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1ADQAHsqsie5PBeQhQgjcKmUu3qdPFg6aA/?:users/1F4Ed2JCo7ffcFFFREMtKFrtSonFL381bp:infinity:catalog
[/code]
I'll even kickstart it with some content.

I made an 8chan board over at millchan. As another bunker in case technical issues arise on this one. I do like the concept of zeronet, and would regularly use it. So I think it'd be great if there was steady baseline of activity and persistent history for the community on this side of the internet.

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1DdPHedr5Tz55EtQWxqvsbEXPdc4uCVi9D/?:users/17wVyfuXoQmWbo8pMvzWx7iSNdA3446NdF:misc:f0efbe66-3b82-4bb7-a151-640c1c30d565#916f09c1-7f3a-4a27-b6f2-228b6cfdb101

>>843df955-415a-4d2f-b278-c28cbc7eb7db
I started blacklisting all the porn and patreon leak boards and got more space back.

>>b6c3e125-193c-4e4d-8356-ae696fad4056
[code]http://127.0.0.1:43110/1ADQAHsqsie5PBeQhQgjcKmUu3qdPFg6aA/?:users/1F4Ed2JCo7ffcFFFREMtKFrtSonFL381bp:infinity:catalog[/code]
In case of weird loading with /misc/

>>20f43bfa-1d49-4ee4-977e-852d28a94d90
>So is this site the permanent arrangement or temporary?
By the technicals alone, it's less prone to outages since decentralization. I don't mind that the bunker gets slight consistent activity to make switches easier in the future.

>>ec350e27-9af4-436d-985a-aa2830050501
Can you set up a ZeroMail ID? When anon was posting about the outdated site, I was really looking for some form of communication.

>>aed23f6d-cb0e-4672-9042-2f1f42b1ff2b
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1DdPHedr5Tz55EtQWxqvsbEXPdc4uCVi9D/?:users/13E1NfoEM9eYfxk3mZQTLW5qYBekTp5W7v:v:e0a6634e-bb76-4cb6-9c34-719011e548da
He's awake.

posts.subject: Decentralized Network Discussion
posts.body:
Parallel Thread: 
[code]http://127.0.0.1:43110/1ADQAHsqsie5PBeQhQgjcKmUu3qdPFg6aA/?:users/1F4Ed2JCo7ffcFFFREMtKFrtSonFL381bp:infinity:bc558053-3654-4bee-9fef-b356028acd6b[/code]

>Could we have an indepth discussion on this?

>There's several types of decentralized pages and webapps. If we're going to establish anything in the long term, there should be a solid evaluation on the alternatives.

>FreeNet
>GnuNet
>ZeroNet
>i2p
>And probably more.

>Why have a site on here over the other? Is one a platform? Are some others actual protocols?

I think there was another thing called nntpchan as well. If we can get a solid idea of where to have the community set up in case of 8chan outages, that'd be great.

>>ea310ac3-9670-4db3-82c7-4f35ca7ca7d8
My speculation, he might be a little sour about 8chan being taken away from him. It's a shame because I thought he was really cool back in 2014~2015.

>>d63aee41-2e38-4d0b-b86f-060f41779073
I can't use this site with Qutebrowser because no boards show up. And I talked with someone else about it, and they couldn't see anything on Opera.

I see an [M] next to a post, which is for mute. How do I blacklist the inevitable shitposting threads without muting the entire user?
(That's assuming anon is just having a shitpost episode and will later make actually good posts.)

>>6b466393-7dce-4d0d-aa7d-87306da1a08a
I don't think there's a file size limit. But really I don't want to have to load and seed a 100 MB video if some anons decide to post that. I'd just say to use a regular damn torrent for that.

>>7c6404ca-95df-42be-9c78-0e6eef363fc8
I'd really hold back on optimism on file sizes. I don't actually want faggots to dump a 1 GB embedded file and make everyone have to download that to see the rest of the board.

It's fanfic so text documents are in the kilobytes, but still.

posts.subject: Drawfag and General Illustrating
posts.body:
Parallel Thread:
[code]http://127.0.0.1:43110/1ADQAHsqsie5PBeQhQgjcKmUu3qdPFg6aA/?:users/1F4Ed2JCo7ffcFFFREMtKFrtSonFL381bp:infinity:60d3a01b-ed6d-4f58-8c2d-ac19a7ce3157[/code]

>Any drawfags from 8chan make it over to ZeroNet? I posted on /vg/ and this was my shit. Post here if you're from /loomis/, /art/ or any art board (which all of them were tiny and out of the top 50).

Post your art and let us know you made it over.
I'm the faggot without a tablet so my art in gimp is pretty much limited to straight lines.

>>b24efb34-fa0a-4ca3-a05a-1ab8f16f3b2a
Isn't it possible to deanonymize users by looking at their id when clicking mute? How can we generate a separate profile?

>>d133bb77-d01e-4d37-aff7-ae9c5c7c6603
How exactly do I generate a new address though?

>>f18a81a1-6442-4b7a-a36f-1e33af407eba
It hasn't done that for me.
Add:
What it's doing is saying it's generating a new certificate, but when I press mute, it's the same.

>>0d024bad-5e67-4240-b2aa-d46c12087e35
I made a board, but I also want to shamelessly post about two separate hobbies in which I maintained separate identities for on clearnet.

posts.subject: Fandom Idiosyncrasies You Don't Understand
posts.body:
>fandom keeps pairing two supporting characters in a series
>its cuddly and kissy romance
>one of them is literally a eunuch both physically and emotionally
>canonically, at the end, the other one threatens the other with mind shredding interrogation (setting has neural interfaces and brainwashing technology)
Leaves me wondering: where the fuck is this coming from?

Here is a millchan blacklist so you don't have to download and allocate space for 100 MB of loli, camwhore patreon content, and fury porn. The names at the end are the board names. Stuff like capital letters are cam girls' initials e.g NSJ is nonsummerjack. 

You put it in the options menu. But you can selectively delete lines if you wish. /l/ is loli, and /y/ is yiff on millchan.

posts.subject: Where is the source code for 08chan?
posts.body:
>click Millchan engine on the bottom of the page
>Connecting...
>Trackers announcing: 1, error: 2, done: 11
>Peers found: 102
>Peers found: 104
>content.json download failed
Never loads anything.

>Go to Millchan's main repository.
https://gitgud.io/millchan/Millchan
>No license. All rights reserved
>All rights reserved

>>132d7f4f-6dee-4417-8779-08a4c438dd4e
That's Millchan's upstream. What about the specific modifications 08chan's fork?
The most I would use it for is tip jar donations for anything creative I do, but most people in cryptocurrency are investors not spenders.
Test because I haven't posted since anti-spam update.
Test with no certificate.

>>53229f31-f30e-434c-97a1-ba13836e2d23
Then I don't get the point of these instructions.
>>3f3f085e-9aad-4b1a-8ae1-5b6281abc942
